screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .prfpset file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code 1.6
screenshot.caption: PRFPSET file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code 1.6

description: Premiere Pro presets save you time by saving the settings of an effect. After saving the effect preset you can apply it to future video clips instead of having to recreate the effect from scratch. PRFPSET files also allow you to easily share effects with other Premiere Pro users.

NOTE: To export a PRFPSET file, open the "Effects" pane in Premiere Pro, choose the preset you would like to export, click the three-line hamburger icon (or right-click the preset in the pane), and select Export Presets... .

images.caption: PRFPSET file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code 1.6
